tns:Template.name: Message
Report
tns:Template.tns:body: <report templateid="{B}" functionid="{C}" name="{E}" format="{D}" maxRetryTimes="100" description=""> <reportNames> <reportName language="EN" lang="en" name="{E}" /> <reportName language="ZH_CN" lang="zh-cn" name="" /> <reportName language="ZH_TW" lang ="zh-tw" name="{F}" /> </reportNames> </report>

tns:Template.name: king
tns:Template.tns:body: INSERT INTO SYS_LEDGER_MAP(PAYMENT_TYPE, FEE_CODE, RPMNT_MTHD, LEDGER_CODE, LEDGER_NAME, LEDGER_CATEGORY, VOUCHER_ACCU_FACTOR, VOUCHER_SUM, REMARK, CREATED_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATE_TIME, REC_VER, TAG_SEQ) VALUES ('{A}', DECODE('{C}','贷款金额','LOAN_AMT','实际发放金额','LOAN_ACTUAL_AMT','服务费','HANDLING_FEE','实收金额','ACTUAL_AMT','本金','PRINCIPAL','月利息','INTEREST','管理费','BROKER_FEE_2012','违约金2','PENALTY_2012','扣款失败手续费','FAIL_COLLECT_FEE','逾期违约金','OVERDUE_INTEREST','延期费','DELAY_FEE','居间费','BROKER_FEE','违约金','PENALTY','外包催收费','COLLECT_COST','多收金额','ADV_RECEIVE',null), DECODE('{D}','发放贷款','PAY','银行进账','TRANSFER','自动代扣','COLLECT_AGENCY','续贷抵扣','RENEW_LOAN',NULL), '{F}','{E}', DECODE('{G}','借方','DEBIT','CREDIT'), {I}, '{J}','{K}', 'DC', sysdate, 'DC', sysdate, 0, 0);
